column1: 1929 Jan 4.09, Feb 1.8, Mar 2 and total estimated therefore removed
1949 Jan 1.53, July 1.59 and total estimated and therefore removed.
No NGR given on any of the records; NGR for  Kidderminster Water Works in Pump St and elevation fits.
1946 gauge moved 1/4 mile SW and elevation recorded as 200 ft
1948 gauge moved 1/4 mile SE on 12th Feb and elevation changed to 178 ft
